title: Episode 119: Words & Numbers Listener Special #3
itunes:title: Episode 119: Words & Numbers Listener Special #3
description:
If the federal government disappeared, would there still be a United States? Does every country fall on a spectrum between two extremes, capitalism and communism? Are there any good reasons to restrict voting rights? This week, James Harrigan and Antony Davies answer questions about the subjective theory of value, debts to society, guns vs. butter, and plenty more in this week’s jam-packed episode of Words & Numbers.

Come to FEEcon 2019!


Foolishness of the week

Pennsylvania Mayors

Pew Poll on Views About Gun Regulation

Topic of the week: Listener questions

Join the conversation:

Words & Numbers Backstage

Antony Davies on Twitter

James R. Harrigan on Twitter

Let us know what you think at: wordsandnumberspodcast@gmail.com
